it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.utils.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.model.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteObservable, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DominationBoard

    public class Board
extends Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class describes a game board.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getSpawnPointSquare

        public Square getSpawnPointSquare(AmmoColor spawnPointColor)
        Given an AmmoColor returns reference to the same colored SpawnPoint, if existing
        Parameters:
        spawnPointColor - chosen color
        Returns:
        SpawnPoint of spawnPointColor color, null if it doesn't exist

      • setSquare

        public void setSquare(Square square)
        Adds a square to the board. Besides adding it to the grid, it sets east, west, north and south attributes and it also changes its neighbour squares accordingly.
        Parameters:
        square - Square to add, must not be null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if square is null

      • setNorthNeighbour

        private static void setNorthNeighbour(Square square,
                                      Board board,
                                      boolean reciprocal)
        Set northern neighbour of a square if it exists.
        Parameters:
        square - whose neighbour will be set
        board - the game board
        reciprocal - whether to create the inverse link too

        board - the game board
        reciprocal - whether to create the inverse link too

      • isDominationBoard

        public boolean isDominationBoard()
        Returns whether the Board is a DominationBoard. Always true in the children class DominationBoard, always false here.
        Returns:
        true, since this is a normal Board and not a DominationBoard

      • deserialize

        public static Board deserialize(java.lang.String json)
        Creates Board object from a JSON serialized object. This method also sets each Square's neighbours and Players to the correct state.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON input String
        Returns:
        Board object
